Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • fr.sy43.studzero.sqlite.helper.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class is used to access the database of the app
